devNotes.content:
# Hello World
My name is **Harshit Rajoria**
https://geocities.restorativland.org/CapeCanaveral/Station/3110/

### 3rd Day of Web Design Though it is really interesteing class which keeps me continuously engaged, there were few instanses where I felt I am not able to keep up with the class and mentor. But at the end I made it. Today I learned some new terms with the help of the game Flaxbox Froggy like align-items, justify-content, wrap, order, Float. I am excited for tomorrow. Found the grouping of cursors very interesting- https://dabric.xyz/ **Layout for the story- The Pen and The Inkstand** https://www.figma.com/design/a2agHtf8HRDju7mNgRtBC8/Event-App?node-id=341-2192&t=FODoEYOspTza17MQ-1

### "Independent Ownership"-It's stuck with me. Today again, I felt that there is something I can make for myself (a digital one) not just some physical product. It was positive day where I learned about the tearm Indie Web, something that feels like ours. Got to know its principles. Went through many blogs and different websites that can help buiding my websites. ### My Manifesto This website is about deep diving into my experiences where you will look at all of my work connected with my interests. Even building this website from scratch will itself be a part of my portfolio. This website is totally made by me without depending on any constraints where I have to follow somebody else’s guideline or layout. I believe in Independent Ownership where I as a designer can showcase my progress and share personal knowledge. It is a safe platform where you will flow freely. If you’ll give time in the exploration, it may assist you with many resources and insights. I will be updating my website in every 6 months and I always try to make it feel like a friend sharing his experiences to another friend. ![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/32fe1bb6-414c-4402-b623-f9e3ca0bf3fc)

### Today's Notes Today we were given time for making low fidelity layouts for our website. Read some blogs and readings on design components and principles. I think having a look at these readings everytime before starting any module or any design project is important for me. ### Layouts It will be a simple website for now and as I will move forward with mid or high fidelity, my mind I will visualise more elements that I can add to it.

devNotes.issueTitle: Day 11: [Project Day 1] Here comes the sun
devNotes.content: ## Today's task - [x] Move ahead with the tutorial to get more comfortable with astro. - [x] Create header and footer. - [x] Add content in About Me page. - [ ] Create componet card of Header and Footer. ## Tomorrow's task - [ ] Create componet card of Header and Footer. - [ ] Add backgorund image. - [ ] Add finalised content in About Me page. Link :- https://iamharshitrajoria.netlify.app/ Excited for tomorrow.

devNotes.issueTitle: Day 12: [Project Day 2] Don't stop me now
devNotes.content: #My Progress Sorry for the delay. I am sharing my Devnotes for today that is 7th August. Today I finished first page of my portfolio website. It was fun while figuring out what code will fit best for the layout. I shifted from building my website on Astro to vanilla html. While coding I took help from many resources like mdn, w3schools, chatgpt and my classmates. I have to do little bit of more refinement like editing the menu button hover, its colour and as sir told I can try adding the background grid by coding and by placing an image. My tomorrow's task is to- - [ ] Complete the About Page with all the refinements. - [ ] Complete Work page by adding the thumbnails of my project. ### Links:- Repository url- https://github.com/HarshitRajoria/Meri-Website Netlify Link- [portfolio-harshit-rajoria.netlify.app](https://portfolio-harshit-rajoria.netlify.app/)
